Posts.Content: SadFriend wrote: I have been watching this board on behalf of a dear friend - Courtenay - who died this afternoon.  First diagnosed three years ago, triple negative, lumpectomy, chemo, rads.  Mets appeared in Sept '07 - brain, liver, lungs, bones. Just 3 months ago. She was a radiant 32 year old with wonderful husband and a beautiful 3 year old daughter.  Please include her in your prayers.  Please take good care of yourselves. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Another Angel SadFriend Mary-Lou
